material: vinyl/neoprene coated metal with cast-iron core
key_features: Vinyl coated for comfortable and non-slip feel
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
ai_description: A pair of black dumbbells with a smooth, matte neoprene/vinyl coating. The dumbbells feature hexagon-shaped ends that prevent rolling and are marked with the KAKSS brand and weight designation. The coating provides a comfortable, non-slip grip surface. The product appears to be part of a color-coded set where different weights correspond to different colors, with black representing the 2KG pair. The dumbbells have a professional appearance suitable for home or gym use.
